title: Toy Sled
summaries: The Toy Sled is a Hardmode pet-summoning item that spawns a Baby Snowman pet to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Baby Snowman will ride a toy sled to catch up to them. The Toy Sled has a 1/20 (5%) chance of being dropped by Ice Mimics found in the Ice biome.

statistics.Sell: 2 GC50 SC
